result.title: Right answer on my local machine, wrong on codechef
result.content:
Hello, I am new to coding and codechef. I was trying to solve 946B â€” Weird Subtraction Process here is my submission http://codeforces.com/problemset/submission/946/37702998

int main() { long a, b; cin >> a >> b; while (a != 0 && b != 0) { if (a >= (2 * b)) { a = a % (2 * b); } else if (b >= (2 * a)) { b = b % (2 * a); } else break; } cout << a << " " << b; return 0; } for testcase 3: 1000000000000000000 7

it gives correct output on my local machine "8 7" but on codeforces it gives "0 16388148"

kindly help. thanks
